metadata.job_to_be_done: Prepare a vegetarian buffet-style dinner menu for a corporate gathering, including gluten-free items.

subsection_analysis.refined_text: o Cut paneer into cubes and marinate for at least 1 hour. add yogurt, lemon juice, cumin, coriander, garam masala, turmeric, and salt.

in a bowl, mix soy sauce, mirin, sugar, sake, grated ginger, and minced garlic. pour marinade into the skillet and simmer until thickened. serve chicken over cooked rice garnished with sliced green onions.
sauté minced garlic in sesame oil until fragrant. add bok choy and stir-fry until tender.
o Heat oil in a pan and sauté diced onion until translucent. o Add diced carrot, peas, cumin, coriander, turmeric, and garam masala, cook for 1 minute.
sauté chicken, diced onion, and minced garlic in olive oil until browned. add cumin, turmeric, ginger, and salt, cook for 1 minute. pour chicken and sauce over bread and serve warm.
1 cup cherry tomatoes, halved 1/2 cucumber, diced 1/4 cup red onion, finely chopped 1/4 cup black olives, crumbled feta cheese. salt and pepper to taste 1 tablespoon red wine vinegar.

o 2 cups flour o 1/4 cup sugar o 1 tablespoon baking powder o 1/2 teaspoon salt o 3/4 cup water o Oil for frying • Instructions: o Mix flour, sugar, baking powder, and salt in a bowl. o Roll out dough and cut into triangle
1 whole wheat tortilla: 1 cup cooked chicken breast, sliced; 1 cup romaine lettuce, chopped; 2 tablespoons Caesar dressing. add chicken, lettuce, and Parmesan cheese; roll up tortilla tightly.
o Cut avocados in half, remove the pit, and scoop out the flesh into a bowl. o Add lime juice, diced onion, chopped tomatoes, salt, cilantro, and garlic.
sauté ground beef, diced onion, minced garlic, chopped olives, and raisins with cumin, paprika, and salt until cooked. o Place a spoonful of filling on each circle and fold to seal.
